documents.document: I swear I go to the ice hockey for a few hours after work, and Trump starts a war with my home country.
Very grateful to be named among Newcastle's top citizen Honours for 2017. From so far, I feel so encouraged.

@POTUS in DC for a few weeks interning, can I be your valentine?
(Or maybe a signed photo)
(Or we can hang out)

Great to hear of the amazing progress being made at the Fiji-NSLF partner school I visited earlier this year, can't wait to head back soon.
Happy Holidays to the legends on the @Space_Station - everyone is loving your work here today at the @airandspace museum. #spacetoground
#day2 of the #parliamentprotest narrative has yet been on the cause but persists to be about Parliamentary security...
Not particularly impressed by the Parliamentary protest today. Fervently for the cause, not fervently for the action taken. #auspol
Episode 2 of #FirstContact, sure it's not amazing - but in defence, this is the wider population SEEING. Finally. Somehow. What is going on.
Finished watching #FirstContact this afternoon. It's getting slammed but truly I think it's about time.
A great write up of scary circumstances surrounding the near destruction of my hometown-after-scool-hang. Sickening. https://t.co/lXctqajsZ3

Lets go #breakthealliance #keeptheintelligence #AIIA16
@gregjamesbarton @ #AIIA16, so good to hear the recognition of liberal backsliding in Eastern Europe as a situation with global consequences
John McCarthy Trumps anti-islamic rhetoric has effect on large populations in south easy asia which in turn will have effect on AUS. #AIIA16
@GMegalogenis explains how socio-econonic voting patterns in Australia could mirror those that produced the "shock" of Brexit. #AIIA16
'Pivot to asia' my fave international relations jargon #AIIA2016
@SenatorWong the first at #AIIA2016 to deal with how Aus should look to its closest neiggbours, pacific islands, wish there was more detail.
@SenatorWong at #AIIA2016. Got to speak to Senator Wong @NSLFAustralia last year, amazing woman. She's captured this room here already.
@RichardDiNatale Australia must do the heavy lifting to stabilise global warming before it multiplies threats, US will do little. #AIIA2016
@RichardDiNatale #AIIA16 outlining how Greens feel Aus should fundamentally reasses alliance with the US in face of climate change & nuclear
Allan Gyngell, from Lowy, speaking on an interesting concept: Australian interests v values, in foreign policy and how they interact.
Kim Beazley speaking fantastically about how Australia's foreign policy will react to recent international events. #AIIA16
'Understanding the US Election' lecture tonight, informative, but I still don't understand. No one does not even the expert God pls help us.
Got my PhD topic handed to me on a silver platter. "Why the popular vote means 0: How the Electoral College screwed up the 2016 US election"
